alert.note: Alert for Brown; Callahan; Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels; San Saba; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 01 at 11:36PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southern Callahan, Brown, Coleman, McCulloch, southeastern Taylor, eastern Runnels, Concho and western San Saba Counties through 1230 AM CDT... At 1135 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Lawn to Voss to near Eden. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brownwood, Brady, Coleman, Early, Winters, Santa Anna, Richland Springs, Paint Rock, Eden, Bangs, Cross Plains, Tuscola, Lawn, Melvin, Novice, Lake Brownwood Near Thrifty, Cross Cut, Brookesmith, Waldrip and Lake Brownwood State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Brown; Callahan; Coleman; Concho; McCulloch; Runnels; San Saba; Taylor
